Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: A handle to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) to be used to verify a signed message. The CSP identified by this handle is used for hashing and for signature verification.Unless there is a strong reason for using a specific cryptographic provider, set this member to zero to use the default RSA or DSS provider.
